attributes.action: The Popes homophobia and transphobia is not welcome in the UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Following the Popes Christmas address that included his condemnation homosexuality and transgenderisum that he compared as an equal risk to the planet as climate change.  

We the people ask for the Pope to be banned from entering into the the UK and join his fellow bigots Fred Phelps, Yunis Al-Astal, Mike Guzovsky, Stephen Black, Erich Gliebe, Artur Ryno, Pavel Skachevsky, Wadgy Abd El Hamied Mohamed Ghoneim, Abdullah Qadri Al Ahdal, Safwat Hijazi and Amir Siddique on the banned persons list.

It is unacceptable for this religious leader to come to the UK and preach his hate of the LGBT community.
